title: Quantum Computing Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of quantum mechanics and qubits, and explore how quantum circuits work.

title: Python Programming for Beginners
description: Start coding in Python with hands-on exercises, data structures, and practical mini-projects.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: Get started with supervised and unsupervised learning, and build simple ML models from scratch.

title: Web Development with React
description: Learn modern React, components, hooks, and how to build a small web application from scratch.

title: Cryptography Essentials
description: Explore classical and modern cryptography, including ciphers, hashing, and public-key encryption.
